title: Thibs in New York, Lou Will’s Excursion, and Seeding Games Preview | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the New York Knicks hiring Tom Thibodeau (0:12), Lou Williams visiting Magic City while on leave from the Orlando campus (21:30), and the imminent start of seeding games (43:01).
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor

itunes:author: The Ringer
